title: Impeachment, 2020 Update, Fed Decision
itunes:title: Impeachment, 2020 Update, Fed Decision
description:
Guest host June Grasso discusses the latest news on impeachment, the 2020 presidential election and the Federal Reserve's decision to leave interest rates unchanged.


Panel guests: Mattie Duppler, Senior Fellow at the National Taxpayers Union and former Former Coalitions Director for the House Republican Conference and Max Burns, Democratic Strategist and Contributor at The Daily Beast and The Independent.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
